comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: I have seen embroidered garb similar to this identified as a Mexican Wedding Dress. Here's the Frida Kahlo model (click the link and scroll down a few inches): tessimalscelestialart.com/vintage/frida-kahlo-boho-reviva...
